dct_title_s: Map of California showing general plan for the reclamation of the entire Sacramento and San Joaquin Valleys
dct_description_sm: distributed by California State Irrigation Association.
Shows which areas are to be irrigated by which specific rivers.
Also shows hydro-electric power plants and substations (with kilowatt capacity figures), transmission lines and power companies.
Includes the text of the "Marshall Plan" distributed with Journal of Electricity.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
